public.attendance.initQuery: select date, schoolid, count(attendance) from public.attendance where attendance = TRUE group by schoolid, date order by date;
public.attendance.updateQuery: select '{date}' as date, t.schoolid, t.count as attendance from (select schoolid, count(attendance) from public.attendance where date='{date}' and attendance = TRUE group by schoolid) as t where schoolid = {schoolid};
